author: Osho
quote: A serious person can never be innocent, and one who is innocent can never be serious

author: Osho
quote: Accept yourself as you are. And that is the most difficult thing in the world, because it goes against your training, education, your culture.

author: Osho
quote: A comfortable, convenient life is not a real life – the more comfortable, the less alive. The most comfortable life is in the grave.

author: Osho
quote: The only authentic responsibility is towards your own potential. Values have not to be imposed on you. They should grow with your awareness, in you.

author: Osho
quote: If you love yourself, you love others. If you hate yourself, you hate others. In relationship with others, it is only you mirrored.

author: Osho
quote: Happiness is an art that one has to learn. It has nothing to do with your doing or not doing.

author: Osho
quote: If you live with love, through love, you will live a great life, because love makes everything great.

author: Osho
quote: Don´t be unnecessarily burdened by the past. Go on closing the chapters that you have read; there is no need to go back again and again.

author: Osho
quote: Drop comparing and life is really beautiful. Drop comparing and you can enjoy life to the full.

author: Osho
quote: The greatest freedom is to be free of one’s own mind.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: Even if you don't have all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you don't want.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: You can never be wise and be in love at the same time.

author: Bob Dylan
quote: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
